name: Rice w/Chicken & Broccoli+Avocado
recipe: Cook 1 cup of rice in 2 cups of water with a pinch of salt until tender. Season 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then cook in a skillet with olive oil for 6-8 minutes per side. Let the chicken rest, then slice or dice into bite-sized pieces. Cut a small head of broccoli into florets and steam for 5-7 minutes until tender. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, chicken pieces, steamed broccoli, and sliced avocado from 1 ripe avocado.

name: Boiled Potato w/Chicken & Avocado+Olive Oil
recipe: Boil 4 medium-sized potatoes in salted water until fork-tender. Season 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then cook in a skillet with olive oil for 6-8 minutes per side. Let the chicken rest, then slice or dice into bite-sized pieces. Cut a ripe avocado in half, remove the pit, and slice the flesh. In a large mixing bowl, combine. Drizzle olive oil over the top and season with salt and pepper to taste. Gently toss all the ingredients together until well combined.

name: Salmon w/Boiled Potatoes & Avocado+Bread
recipe: Boil 4 medium-sized potatoes until fork-tender. While the potatoes cook, season a salmon fillet with salt and pepper, then pan-sear it in olive oil for about 4-5 minutes on each side until cooked through. Set the cooked salmon aside. In large mixing bowl, combine the boiled potatoes (cut into bite-sized pieces), slices of ripe avocado, and toasted bread cubes. Season with salt and pepper, and toss to combine. Break the cooked salmon into flakes and gently fold it into the potato, avocado, and bread mixture.
